name: Adult Simulator
description:
Life is a constant balance between hundred of things! With this game for the #ActualAdultJam I wanted to explore how the routine balance our lives.  

To complete the game you need to survive for 15 days in a life simulation. Everyday you can do a simple task, just write the action on the terminal. The play session is just a couple minutes!

I hope you like it, please leave a comment!
